Blog.post: So this is my first post. Still not sure why i am doing this. I just woke up and i am extermly tired. Well, i am off but goodluck and keep it real.
urlLink This is what drinking does to you

So i just plaied madden 2005 for the first time on xbox live. i lost 21-7. i was the phildelphia eagles and i plaied against the carolina panthers. to be honest i am not as good at madden as i used to be. i have too many video games now and it dialoots my video game skill. so be it. it is more fun be an experienced video game users. after losing i was messing around with what madden on live had to offer and i noticed that there was a group "rushing attack." so i checked it out; it is the rushing attack mini camp vs. another person. lots of fun. you have 1 minute on offense and then one minute on defense. like most games who ever has the most points wins. after you play someone you can chose to re-match or no. i plaied about 10 games with 3 different people and i think i was 7-3ish. but afterwards i checked out my profile and it said i handt palied a game. =(. not sure why but, oh well. Corey, the guy driving the mini (below) is coming over right now and i am going to whoop up on him in some nfl street. Ea added a lot of defense pre-span controls to madden which i am a big fan of. i think i might be going to the redskins game tom which should be fun. that is if hurrcanes dont come and kill us. godspeed

So fantasy football is coming up and i am going to beat the hell out of all my friends... All i do is make the best picks and i am not going to just win i am going to best the hell out of everyone.. Good luck...

So this is my first Wednesday post. Hence the title being hump day. I really have nothing to write right now but i need to give the people what they want. i had the single worst day so far at work. Nothing was working nothing. i was so frustrated. But hey i guess that is a day in the life of a programmer. Anyway i havent been drunk in a while and i think i am going to get drunk this weekend. Should be a lot of fun. I will prob hooks it with some hottie this weekend. i mean thats what i do so that is what i think i prob will do. Ither that or the 100% exact opposite. 180 degree difference. You can decied. Most likly i am better at mineswepper than you. =) Godspeed, Zach (1057)

it is kinda funny. i was looking for houses in dc today with my pops. Some we wanted to go look at and others we just walked by. it is weird how i liked a house (condo, or townhouse) that was 450 more than one offered for 750. it just doesnt make sense. i wonder if those being sold for 750 are ever going to sell. i guess what i am looking for and what a fmaily is looking for might be different but even then 300 is a lot of money. and the location's are pretty similar so i am confused. I am very happy the USA basketball team lost today in the olympics. just goes to show just because you can drunk a ball doesnt mean you are good at basketball.
